container.help: Use this condition to set the remove fixities feature

condition.help: Use this condition to remove fixities associated only with solid phase materials

value.help: OFF = keep fixity, ON = remove fixity
OFF = keep fixity, ON = remove fixity
OFF = keep fixity, ON = remove fixity

condition.help: Use this condition to remove fixities associated only with the liquid phase

value.help: OFF = keep fixity, ON = remove fixity
OFF = keep fixity, ON = remove fixity

condition.help: Use this condition to remove fixities associated only with the gas phase

value.help: OFF = keep fixity, ON = remove fixity
OFF = keep fixity, ON = remove fixity
